channel.title: Status checker problem?
channel.description: Hi i recently started hosting my first 525, and its been on 3 different status checkers since 5-1-11, and it has been at 100% on all three..... All of a sudden today for about 10 mins mopar said my server was offline while the other 2(not named) said it was online. Now my servers at 99% on mopar alone while at 100% on other two. Now i was on first mopar page this morning and now im on third. i hate to complain about 1% but my playerbase isn't large enough to satisfy me and being on the third page will attract less. will it go back to 100% if it stays online? if not what are my options? Sorry for complaining for something so little. -Jklolyoudead

item.title: Status checker problem?
item.dc:creator: @hoopdude75 hoopdude75
item.description:
@hoopdude75 wrote:

Hi i recently started hosting my first 525, and its been on 3 different status checkers since 5-1-11, and it has been at 100% on all three… All of a sudden today for about 10 mins mopar said my server was offline while the other 2(not named) said it was online. Now my servers at 99% on mopar alone while at 100% on other two. Now i was on first mopar page this morning and now im on third. i hate to complain about 1% but my playerbase isn’t large enough to satisfy me and being on the third page will attract less. will it go back to 100% if it stays online? if not what are my options? Sorry for complaining for something so little.
-Jklolyoudead
